package.description: This package contains the robot model that is used by the realtime controllers inside controller manager. This robot model fucusses on controlling the robot mechanism in a realtime control loop, and therefore it only contains the components of a robot that are relevant in realtime: the robot joints (with encoders, transmisisons and actuators) and the kinematic/dynamic model of the robot. The pr2 mechanism model package has been modified many times, and has become kind of messy. Future releases of this package will likely have a very different API than the current release.
